text: The Neverending Story is a 1995-16 Canadian/French/German animated series co- produced by CineVox Entertainment (Germany) and animated by Ellipse Animation (France) and Nelvana Limited (Canada) produced in co-production with the Family Channel (Canada) Canal+ (France) and France 3 (France) and with the participation of Center National De Da cinematographe (France) and Home Box Office (United States) Category:1995 Canadian television series debuts Category:1996 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian animated television series
title: The Neverending Story (TV series)
